Javier, está decidido por un nuevo préstamo, el cual invertirá en la compra de materiales agrícolas como abono, herbicidas y semilla, para iniciar la siembra en una manzana de terreno. Con este dinero del préstamo estará trabajando para prepara la tierra y que sus cultivos sean provechosos.
Él manifiesta que a través de los préstamos es como ha logrado sobresalir con todas sus obligaciones y que su familia se siente más apoyada.
texts.en: Javier has decided to take a new loan, which he will invest in agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, herbicides and seeds so that he can start planting a manzana (about 1.7 acres) of land.  With the money from this loan, he will be working to prepare the land so that his cultivations will be profitable.  He states that it has been through these loans that he has managed to fulfill all of his obligations and make his family feel better supported.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, herbicides and seeds

loans.name: Crhis

texts.es: Crhis, de 30 años, es una mujer amable, buena y trabajadora. Convive con Miguel de 35 años y con quien tiene un hijo de 3 años. Juntos viven en su casa propia en donde se dedica a tiempo completo a su trabajo y a educar a su hijo. El trabajo de Crhis consiste en la venta de bebidas gaseosas y cerverzas a personas con mayoría de edad. Asimismo vende comida. Diariamente exhibe sus productos en la refrigeradora que posee, y durente el fin de semana vende platos típicos de la región y de algunos otros lugares, ya que su experiencia en la cocina es muy buena. Lleva realizando su trabajo por 4 años y lo hace sola ya que se da abasto para poder realizar de manera tranquila. Recuerda que al principio le fue muy complicado hacerlo sola, pero como no tenía capital para contratar a otra persona, por lo que tuvo que aprender a trabajar así. Espera poder seguir trabajando mucho mas y de esa manera mejorar su economía. Este será el crédito número 4 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por su parte ella se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas y así seguir siendo una socia puntual como en créditos anteriores. Con el monto solicitado 2500 soles, comprará ingredientes e insumos para ofrecer mayor variedad de platos a su clientes, además de abastecer su almacén con algunas bebidas mas.
texts.en: 30-year-old Crhis is a good, friendly, hardworking woman. She lives with 35-year-old Miguel, with whom she has a three-year-old son. They live together in a house she owns. She devotes herself full-time to working and to raising her son. Crhis sells soft drinks and beer to people of legal drinking age. She also sells food. She displays her merchandise in her refrigerator daily. On weekends, she sells typical food from that region and from other areas, since she has a lot of experience in the kitchen. She has been in this line of work for four years and she does it alone, because she can cope with it easily. She recalls that at first it was very difficult for her to work alone, but since she couldn't afford to hire someone else, she had to learn to work this way. She hopes to keep on working much more, so that she can improve her finances. This will be her fourth loan with MFP, so she counts on your collaboration in order to pursue her goals. On her part, she pledges to make her repayments and continue to be a punctual member, like in her previous loans. With the requested amount of 2.500 soles, she will purchase inputs and supplies in order to offer more varied food to her customers, and also stock her store with a few more beverages.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for making food, and to purchase more beverages.

loans.name: Cornelio Natanael

texts.es:
El señor Cornelio Natanael es casado, tiene 30 años de edad, esta graduado como bachiller, tiene 3 hijos 2 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropa casual para niños, jóvenes y grandes, inicio este negocio gracias al apoyo de sus padres y hasta el momento lleva 5 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderías, consistente en ropa y mejorar su ventas, va a compra playeras, suéteres pantalones, sudaderos, etc. Espera seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
Mr. Cornelio Natanael is 30 years old and married. He's a high school graduate and has three children, two of which attend school. He's in retail; he sells casual clothing for children, teens and adults. He started this business thanks to the support he got from his parents, and he has accumulated five years of experience so far.
He requests a loan which will be used to purchase merchandise consisting of clothing, and to increase his sales. He will purchase t-shirts, sweaters, pants, sweatshirts, etc. He hopes to keep his business growing.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Magdalena Del Carmen

texts.es:
Magdalena, quiere mejorar el inventario en su granja, comprando mas pollos de engorde y lo necesario para alimentarlos, por esta situación está solicitando un nuevo préstamo que le cubra los gastos que va a realizar. 
Ella considera que su vida ha mejorado, ya que con el préstamo anterior invirtió en la compra de pollos para aumentar la granja, esto también le ayudo a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Magdalena wants to improve her farm's inventory by purchasing more broiler chickens and the necessary items for feeding them. On account of this situation she is seeking a new loan which would cover the costs she is going to incur. 

She believes her life has improved since with the previous loan she invested in the purchase of chickens to expand the farm. This also helped her to improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase broiler chickens.

loans.name: Yadira Del Carmen

texts.es: Yadira Del Carmen tiene 40 años de edad, su negocio que emprendió es la venta de comida esta idea de negocio dio inicio cuando trabajaba en Costa Rica ya que empezó como cocinera ayudante en un restaurante lo cual aprendió a preparar diferente platillos que posteriormente se origino la idea de regresarse a su país y de emprender su propio negocio de brindar los servicio de comida, ese era su gran sueño de tener una fuente de trabajo y de generar ingresos para los gastos del hogar. Yadira Del Carmen está solicitando financiamiento para realizar las compras de granos básicos, aceite, carne de todo tipo, verduras, frutas para los frescos y otros productos para la elaboración de la comida.
texts.en: Yadira Del Carmen is 40 years old. The business she began is in prepared food sales. She got this idea for a business while working in Costa Rica since she started off as a chef's assistant at a restaurant where she learned to prepare various dishes. Later she got the idea of returning to her country and setting up her own business providing meals. That was her great dream, to have a source of work and to generate income for household costs. Yadira del Carmen is seeking financing in order to purchase basic staples, oil, all kinds of meat, vegetables, fruits for making drinks and other products to making prepared foods.

loans.use: to purchase basic staples, oil, all types of meat, vegetables, fruits to make drinks with and other products for making prepared foods.

loans.name: Cindy

texts.es: Cindy, de 21 años, es una joven mujer trabajadora, es madre de una niña Kaori de 4 años a quien cría en casa de los padres de su conviviente. Ella trabaja mucho pues lo que mas desea es poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su menor hija. El trabajo de Cindy consiste en la venta de ropa y zapatos, trae de la ciudad de Lima sus productos y acá se encarga de ofrecer entre sus clientes quienes son sus amigos, familiares y vecinos. Vende de dos modalidades, a crédito y al contado. Cada uno tiene su precio y un valor agregado según el tipo de venta que realiza, pero cuando no tiene muchas ventas sale a la calle a ofrecer o se va a donde le llamen ya que a veces sus clientes quieren que los lleve hasta su hogar. Lleva realizando este trabajo por un año y lo hace sola. Le gusta su trabajo por que puede darse el gusto de poner su horario de trabajo al mismo tiempo que genera buenos ingresos para su hogar. Se siente muy cómoda, aunque le encantaría poder aumentar sus productos y mas adelante tener un local en donde atender con mayor comodidad a sus clientes. Este será el crédito número 3 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos. Con el monto solicitado 3000 soles, comprará mas cantidad de mercadería ya que se aproxima la campaña escolar y quiere aprovechar en ofertar zapatos escolares y uniformes de colegio.
texts.en:
Cindy is 21, and a hard-working young woman. She is the mother of a little 4-year-old girl, Kaori, whom she is raising in the home of her partner's parents. 

She works hard, as what she wants most is to be able to offer a better quality of life to her young daughter. Cindy sells clothing and shoes. She brings her products here from Lima and sells them to her customers, who are her friends, family members, and neighbors. 

She sells in two ways, cash and credit. Each item has its price and a slight mark-up according to the type of sale she is making, but when she doesn't have many sales, she goes out to sell on the street; or she goes to where they call her, as sometimes her customers want her to take goods to their home. 

She has been doing this work for a year, and does it on her own. She likes her work because she can arrange her schedule as she likes, at the same time as she generates good income for her household. 

She feels very comfortable in her business, although she would love to be able to increase her stock, and someday have a shop where she can serve customers more conveniently. 

This will be her fourth loan with MFP, so she is hoping for your help, in order to continue toward her goals. With the amount applied for, 3,000 soles, she will buy more merchandise, as the back-to-school season is approaching, and she wants to take advantage by selling school shoes and uniforms.

loans.use: To buy school shoes and uniforms.

loans.name: Elita

texts.es:
Elita, de 35 años, es una mujer amable, emprendedora y muy entusiasta, esta casada con Bartolomé de 40 años, con quien tiene cuatro hijos y a quienes crían con mucho amor. Ella trabaja mucho para brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Desde muy joven aprendió a hacer la cosas por su cuenta, poco a poco fue creciendo con su trabajo y así logró obtener 50 hectáreas de tierras en donde hace 4 años comenzó con un trabajo muy interesante. Es así que siembra semillas de cacao, que una vez cosechado es vendido a las empresas que se dedican a hacer chocolates. Además de sembrar éste tipo de productos, también se dedica a sembrar arroz y maíz. Todo su trabajo lo realiza a lado de su esposo con quien tienen muy buena química al momento de hacer las cosas.
Le esta yendo bien, aunque es conciente que necesita mucho más para poder concretar los objetivos que se trazó. Este será el crédito número 5 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que le volverán a dar la confianza para poder aumentar su capital de trabajo, pues desea incursionar en otro trabajo. Asimismo esta muy comprometida de cumplir con sus pagos de cuotas así como pago en los anteriores créditos que tuvo. Con el monto solicitado 2500 soles, comprará madera para empezar su negocio de fabrica de carbón, además comprará insecticidas para la mala yerba de sus parcelas y abono para poder mejorar la calidad de sus tierras.
texts.en:
Elita, 35, is a cheerful, hardworking and very enthusiastic woman, who is married to Bartolomé, 40, and they raise their four children with a lot of love.  She works to offer them a better quality of life.  From the time she was very young she learned how to do things on her own.  Little by little she grew up with her work and thus succeeded in getting 50 hectares of land where four years ago she started a very interesting business.  She planted cacao seeds and sells the crop to companies that make chocolates.  Besides planting this type of product she also grows rice and corn.  She does all her work together with her husband and they have a good chemistry between them when they work.

It’s going well although she is aware that she needs much more to achieve her goals that she has set.  This will be her 5th loan with MFP.  She is very pleased to know that they continue trusting her to be able to increase her capital  but she wants to begin another business.  She is committed to making all the payments on time as she did with the earlier loans that she received.  She will use the 2500 sols that she has requested to buy wood to begin a business of a charcoal factory, besides buying insecticides for the weeds in her fields and fertilizer to improve the quality of the land.

loans.use: to buy wood, as well as insecticide to care for her fields

loans.name: Abraham

texts.es:
Don Abraham  sigue vendiendo, sus especies, en canela, manzanilla al por  mayor en donde ha logrado la captacion de clientes, siendo de muchos usos medicinales. sus hijos estudian y su mayor objetivo ha sido la construccion de su casa, dando mejores condiciones habitacional a su familia.
Hoy con este nuevo prestamo desea construir su baño e instalar inodoro, siendo de gran necesidad, del uso personal, comprara piedra, arena, cemento, hierro, inodoro, tubos, pega, para las aguas negra. Y poder comenzar la obra.
texts.en:
Don Abraham continues to sell his spices, cinnamon and apples, with various medicinal uses. He sells them by wholesale, which is how he has succeeded in getting customers. His children attend school and his biggest goal has been the costruction of his house, so he can provide better living conditions for his family.
Today, with this new loan, he intends to build his bathroom and install a toilet, which is a great necessity for personal use. He will purchase stone, sand, cement, iron, a toilet, adhesive and pipes for the sewage, and he will be able to start building.

loans.use: to build a bathroom and install a toilet in order to get better hygiene.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es: Julia es socia del Banco Comunal Los Tunales, tiene 49 años, es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace mas de 3 años, es conviviente y madre de 6 hijos de los cuales 5 están a su cargo, se dedica a la venta de cereales, esta en FINCA por invitación de una socia-amiga, le gusta las capacitaciones porque le enseñan a ser responsable, también le han enseñado a educar a sus hijos, gracias a ello ingresaron a la Universidad. Agradece a Finca Perú porque su negocio ha mejorado, ahora esta llevando su mercadería a Chincha e Ica, gracias a ello ahora sus hijas también son socias en el mismo banquito. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en su negocio comprando mas cereales como maíz, quiwicha, linaza y quinua.
texts.en: Julia is a member of the Los Tunales communal bank. She's 49 years old and has been a member of FINCA Peru for over three years. She has a live-in partner and six children, five of which are under her care. She sells cereals and came to FINCA because she was invited by a member and friend. She likes the training programs because they teach her to how be responsible and they have also taught her how to raise her children. Thanks to that, her children have gone to college. She gives thanks to FINCA Peru because her business has improved. She now takes her goods to Chincha and Ica, and because of that, her daughters are also members of the same small bank. The loan she requests will be invested in her business by purchasing more cereals such as corn, amaranth, linseed and quinoa.

loans.use: to purchase more cereals such as corn, amaranth, linseed and quinoa.

loans.name: Flor Del Carmen

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” HATUNCHASKAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Flor del Pilar; ella tiene 65 años de edad, casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de hostal ella lo administra hace varios años atrás siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia, la socia es una persona bien alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de salir adelante, la socia trabaja todos los días ella cuenta con personal que le ayuda en las diferentes áreas que necesita su hostal.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de colchas para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Flor del Pilar is 65 years old, married, and has four children. She belongs to the "Hatunchaskas" communal bank, located in Cusco district, which is part of Cusco province in Cusco department. 

The borrower alternates her daily activities with her hostel business. She has been running it for several years, as this is how she is raising her family. 

She is a really cheerful and responsible person, who is very eager to get ahead. She works every day, and has staff who help her with the various tasks needed to run her hostel. 

The borrower is applying for the loan in order to buy bedspreads for her business. She is happy to be receiving the loan, and promises to make her instalment payments.

loans.use: To buy bedspreads for her business.

loans.name: Ruth Marinela

texts.es:
Ruth, se deicidio por otro préstamo para invertirlo en productos para el negocio, como azúcar, frijoles, huevos, carnes, chorizo, arroz, con esta compra volverá a fortalecer el negocio, manteniendo de todo lo que los clientes necesitan.
Ella considera que el efecto que tuvo en su negocio, la inversión anterior fue muy buena, porque atrajo a más clientes, dándole más oportunidades para seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Ruth has decided to take out another loan to invest in products for her business, such as sugar, beans, eggs, meats, sausage, and rice. With this purchase she will build up her business again, keeping in stock everything her customers need. 

She believes that the previous investment has a very good effect on her business, because she attracted more customers, giving her more opportunities to keep growing.

loans.use: To buy sugar, beans, eggs, meats, sausage, and rice.

loans.name: Noel

texts.es: Noel, de 29 años de edad, originario de la comarca El Dorado en las afueras de Esteli , casado, padre de dos hijos. El es agricultor se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas y granos básicos. Inicialmente comenzó a trabajar con personas cercanas a la comunidad donde sembraban a medias pero desde hace 6 año trabaja por si solo. El vende lo que produce en el mercado local de la ciudad de Esteli, su hermano le ayuda en la mano de obra juntos cosechan y venden la producción. Cuando no están sembrando se dedican a la vente de leche y ganado. El solicito el crédito para compra de insumos para la siembra de ½ manzana de tomate. El espera una producción de calidad y de muy buenos rendimientos que le permita seguir ampliándose en sus areas de siembra y mejorar la calidad  crianza del ganado.
texts.en: 29-year-old Noel comes from the district of El Dorado in the outskirts of Esteli. He's married and the father of two children. He's a farmer who sows vegetables and essential grains. At first he started working with people around the neighborhood by sowing part-time, but for the past six years he has worked by himself. He sells his produce in the local market of the town of Esteli. His brother helps him work; together they harvest and sell the crop. When they're not sowing, they sell milk and livestock. He requested the loan in order to purchase supplies to sow 870 acres of tomatoes. He hopes to get a crop of good quality and very good profits. This will allow him to keep expanding his sowing areas and to improve the quality of the livestock he raises.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to sow 870 acres of tomatoes.

loans.name: Janet Francisca

texts.es: Janet es socia del Banco Comunal Los Tunales, tiene 33 años, es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace 2 años, es madre de 1 hija menor de edad, es conviviente, se dedica a la compra/venta de repuestos y lubricantes para vehículos, es socia por medio de su mamá, le gusta las capacitaciones porque le ayudan a mejorar en su negocio y su familia, gracias a FINCA su negocio ha mejorado, antes solo tenía poca mercadería, ahora esta llenando su tienda con mas lubricantes, en las capacitaciones también le enseña a ahorrar, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en  aumentar mas mercadería en lo que es repuestos comprando muelles para carros.
texts.en:
Janet is a member of Los Tunales Communal Bank and has been a member of FINCA Perú for 2 years. She became a member through her mother. She is 33 years old and the mother of a one-year-old daughter. She lives with her partner and sells spare parts and lubricants for vehicles.

Janet likes the training she receives because it helps her to improve her business and her family. Thanks to FINCA her business has expanded. Before, she had only a small inventory and now she has filled her store with more lubricants. The training has also taught her to save. She will invest the loan she is requesting in expanding her spare parts inventory. She will be buying car springs

loans.use: to purchase springs for cars.

loans.name: Veronica De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Verónica, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para la compra de material para la elaboración de pupusas como maíz, chicharrón, quesillo, frijoles, aceite, con esta compra estará dándole seguimiento al buen funcionamiento del negocio.
Ella tuvo un efecto positivo en el negocio, con la compra anterior, ofreciéndoles a los clientes lo mejor, surtido en productos para el hogar.
texts.en:
Verónica is requesting a new loan to buy ingredients to make “pupusas” (a typical Salvadoran food-grilled corn meal stuffed with pork, or beans or cheese and served with marinated cabbage) such as corn, fried pork skins, cheese, beans and oil.  This purchase will give her a good boost for her business.
Her last purchase had a good effect on the business giving her customers the best variety of household products.

loans.use: to buy corn, oil, cheese, fried pork skins, beans and oil.

loans.name: William Alonso

texts.es:
William, desea continuar  trabajando con la institución, por eso solicita un préstamo para comprar diversidad de dulces, y poder surtir el negocio, con la esperanza de tener un mayor éxito en sus ventas.
Él considera que el efecto que tuvo el préstamo anterior en el negocio fue positivo, que ha mejorado sus condiciones.
texts.en:
William wants to continue working with Padecomsm and is requesting a loan to buy a variety of sweets so he can stock his business in hopes of having greater sales success.

He believes that an earlier loan had a positive impact on his business and improved his working conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of sweets.

loans.name: Julia Maricela

texts.es:
La señorita Julia Maricela es soltera, tiene 28 años de edad, esta graduada de enfermera auxiliar, lleva 3 años de experiencia trabajando en un hospital, cuenta con el apoyo de su familia especialmente de sus padre.

solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para pagara sus estudios, ya que espera especializarse y mejorar su condición de vida y la de su familia. En el futuro quiere ser una doctora profesional.
texts.en:
Julia Maricela, 28, is single and she is an assistant nurse.  She has worked in a hospital for three years and has the support of her family, particularly her father.

She is requesting a loan to pay for her studies since she wants to specialize and improve her living condition and that of her family.  In the future she would like to become a doctor.

loans.use: to cover higher education expenses

loans.name: Santos Aurora

texts.es:
Santos, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo porque quiere abastecer nuevamente el negocio, comprara arroz, frijoles, jabón, detergentes, con los que espera surtir la tienda y tener lo necesario para las necesidades de los clientes.
Ella manifiesta haber tenido una experiencia muy positiva en la utilización del préstamo anterior, esta misma experiencia le ha motivado para seguir creciendo y mejorando cada día, ya que este progreso le ayuda además a su familia.
texts.en: Santos is requesting a new loan because she wants to stock her business again. She will buy rice, beans, soap and detergent and with these, she hopes to supply her store and have the necessary items for her customers.  She says that she has had a very positive experience with the uses of the previous loan.  That same loan motivated her to continue expanding and improving each day since this progress also helps her family

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, soap and detergent.

loans.name: Mahina

texts.ru: Махина берет кредит для покупки молочных продуктов. Так как спрос на этот продукт большой.
texts.en: Mahina is taking this loan to purchase dairy products as there is a high demand for them.

loans.use: to purchase dairy products

loans.name: Eulogio

texts.es: Eulogio, de 43 años, es un hombre bueno, amable y trabajador, esta casado con Celinda de 36 años, con quien tiene cuatro hijos, Elías de 17, Ruth de 15, Elizabeth de 11 y Eliseo de 5. Juntos viven en su casa propia en donde comparten la alegría de estar juntos y los deseos de poder tener una  mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Eulogio consiste en la siembra de productos regionales, día a día se dirige a su chacra que esta ubicado a unos cuantos metros de su hogar, ahí es en donde empieza su labor diaria. Tiene 18 hectáreas distribuidas en tres tipos diferentes de siembra como maíz, arroz y cacao, tiene un mercado amplio para cada tipo de producto que ofrece y es uno de los agricultores a quien mas esperan para comprarle lo que cosecha. En sus 30 años dedicado a este trabajo aprendió mucho y día a día aprende más cosas que ahora él trata de enseñar a sus hijos. Le gusta su trabajo por que puede dedicar tiempo a su familia, además de poder compartir lo aprendido con ellos. Aun recuerda cuando era muy joven de 13 años, empezó a ayudar a sus padres en este negocio, por tanto sabe que es muy complicado dedicarse a la agricultura y lo que desea ahora es poder mejorar sus ingresos y brindar una buena educación a sus hijos a quienes desea verlos como profesionales. Este será el préstamo número 6 con MFP, esta muy contento de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá seguro de avanzar con su trabajo, por otro lado, se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como anteriores créditos que tuvo, además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas muy responsables y solidarias. Con el monto solicitado 2500 soles, comprará herramientas y algunos instrumentos para realizar el mantenimiento de sus parcelas, además de comprar plantas de cacao para seguir sembrando y tener mas cantidad para cosechar.
texts.en:
Eulogio, 43, is a good, friendly and hardworking man. He is married to Celinda, 36, with whom he has four children, Elías, 17, Ruth, 15, Elizabeth, 11, and Eliseo, 5. They live in their own house where they share the joy of being together and the desire to have a better quality of life.

Eulogio plants regional products. Day after day he goes to his farm, which is located a few meters from his home, where he begins his daily labor. He owns 18 hectares (almost 44.5 acres) divided into three different types of cultivation: corn, rice and cacao. He has a good market for each product and is one of the farmers whose crops are most anticipated.  He has learned a great deal in his 30 years dedicated to this work and he continues to learn more every day, knowledge that  he is now trying to teach his children.

Eulogio enjoys his work because he can dedicate time to his family as well as being able to share with them what he has learned. He still remembers when he was very young, only 13, and began to help his parents in this work. Consequently he knows that being a farmer is very complex and he now wants to be able to improve his income and provide his children with a good education. He wants them to become professionals. 

This will be loan no. 6 with MFP. He is very happy to know that he will have financial support because he will feel confident of succeeding in his work. He promises, once more, to make his payments on time as he has done with earlier loans. As well he is glad to be part of his communal bank because all the members are very responsible and supportive people.

With the 2,500 soles requested, Eulogio will buy tools and some instruments to do maintenance on his land as well as cacao plants so he can continue planting and have a larger amount to harvest.

loans.use: to buy tools and cacao plants.

loans.name: Heang

texts.en:
Mrs. Heang is a humble farmer who has been living in Kompong Cham province. Agriculture is the sole source of her income. She has been farming her land for many years. Her annual crops are rice and potatoes. She also has her husband who helps in the business. Presently Heang has two single children who completely depend on her.

Mrs. Heang will use this loan of 1,000,000 riels to pay for local laborers to plow her potato field. For her prospects, Heang wishes to buy a plowing machine for agricultural work and to improve her business. She is very appreciative of the kindly help from the lenders.

loans.use: to pay for local laborers to plow her potato field.

loans.name: Avelina

texts.en: Avelina is married and the mother of two children. She is 50 years old and lives in Campo 5, Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. Avelina used her last loan to purchase additional products to sell. Her business is successful and she's taking a new loan for her food business to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale. In the future, she hopes to be able to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale

location.town: Campo 5, Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga Del Sur

loans.name: Chou

texts.en:
Mrs. Chou, 49, is involved in a poultry business. She presently raises 30 chickens at home in addition to rice farming. Normally Chou’s husband is the one who manages all the rice farming processes. This couple grows rice both in the rainy season and the dry season. Chou has been blessed with three single children, one of whom works for a company in Phnom Penh city.

The purpose of this loan is to buy a pumping machine and a lawn mower, which can be applied to improve this family-owned business. Chou hopes that she will be able to expand her farmland and raise hundreds of poultry in the coming years and thereby increase her household income.

loans.use: to buy a pumping machine and a lawn mower.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is married with two children. Juliet is 41 years old and lives in the Philippines. Juliet is operating a business providing transportation services to local community members to earn a living. She's been doing this for six years and every month she earns 3,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) from this work. She has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to repair a transport vehicle used in the business.

In 2011, Juliet joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living conditions. In the future, Juliet hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to repair a transport vehicle used in her business

loans.name: Miguel Ernesto

texts.es:
Miguel, sigue trabajando la agricultura, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para la compra de insumos y semilla, ya que se dispone a sembrar maíz, frijol, también pagara el alquiler del terreno donde realizara la siembra.
Esta  inversión le ayudara a prepararse para seguir proveyendo para su familia, los granos básicos necesarios y poder cancelar este préstamo.  
Miguel realiza estos cultivos durante el año por medio de regadillos, para mantenerse en constante movimiento, y hacer producir más la tierra.
texts.en: Miguel continues working in agriculture. He is requesting another loan to purchase supplies and seeds as he prepares to plant corns and beans. He will also lease some land to plants his crops. This investment will help him continue providing for his family with necessary basic grains, and he will be able to pay off the loan. Miguel cares for his crops throughout the year by means of irrigation, maintaining constant flow so his land can yield more.

loans.use: to lease some land and purchase supplies and seeds.

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en: Rosie is a 23-year-old single mom of an infant. She is living in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. With her last loan, Rosie was able to buy sewing materials such as textiles, thread, etc. Her business grew and it's successful. Now, she seeks another loan which will be used for her retail store to purchase additional products to sell. She hopes to expand and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
Elma is a 42-year-old married mother of five children. She is living in Campo 5, Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines, where her wide fields of rice production are located. She has been cultivating this land since she was 28 years of age until the present time. She doesn't mind the scratches and itches brought on by this kind of plant for, as long as she can earn income, Elma goes for it. She normally receives 4,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) a month. 

In 2011, Elma joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of 8,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers such as manure to increase production. The revenue from the harvest of her crop will be allotted to expanding her business area to earn more income and to sustain her daily needs.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure

location.town: Campo 5, Ramon Magsaysay, Zamboanga Del Sur

loans.name: Han

texts.en:
Mrs. Han, a 45-year-old loving mother who takes care of five children, has been living in Kompong Cham province. She cultivates rice and vegetables together with her husband for her livelihood. She typically earns an average of $2.50 per day to support the family. Nowadays, one of her sons works as a garment factory laborer in another province and shares part of his income to help the family every month. 

Han has applied for a loan from HKL and Kiva to purchase rice seeds and fertilizer to put on her farmland. For her business plan, she intends to enlarge the size of her land for growing extra rice and vegetables as much as possible.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth, de 35 años, es un mujer amable y buena. Está casada con José de 42 años y con quien tiene cuatro hijos, Yerdi de 16, José de 10, Esmeralda de 7 y el menor Yader de 4 meses quien se convirtió en la alegría de la casa que comparten como una familia unida que son. Ella desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y darles un buena educación. Ella se dedica a la compra, venta y crianza de ganado vacuno, tiene 10 cabezas de ganado entre toros, vacas y terneros, además de esto sale todos los días en busca de vacas, toros más gordos y así comprarlos para después dirigirse al camal de la ciudad en donde le saca su porcentaje de ganancia. Una vez acabado este trabajo se va a su chacra a dar alimentos a sus animales a los que lleva criando recién hace dos años. Le esta yendo bien en lo que hace, ya que le permite tener buenos ingresos y eso le da la tranquilidad de aportar en la economía de su hogar. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP, siempre fue muy buena socia en su banco comunal en donde la quieren mucho por que es muy responsable y solidaria, espera que le puedan brindar el préstamo que será un respaldo para ella y seguir aumentando su negocio, esta convencida que seguirá siendo una socia muy puntual y pagará sus cuotas a tiempo como todos los prestamos que tuvo hasta ahora. Con el monto solicitado 500 soles, comprará alimentos para sus animales, además de habilitar los corrales ya que quiere tener a sus animales seguros.
texts.en: Elizabeth is a friendly 35-year-old woman. She is married to José, 42, with whom she has four children: Yerdi, 16; José, 10; Esmeralda, 7; and Yader, 4 months, who is the joy of the tight-knit household. Elizabeth wants to provide her children with a better quality of life and a good education. She makes a living buying, selling and raising livestock. She has 10 heads of cattle, including bulls, cows and calves. She also goes out every day in search of cows and bigger bulls to buy and then take to the slaughterhouse to get a share of the profits. Once she's done with this work she goes to her farm to feed her animals, which she has been raising for two years. It has been going very well and she has made good income to support the family finances. This will be her fourth loan with Kiva partner MFP. She always has been a very good member of her community bank, where she is loved for being very responsible and supportive. This loan will be a big support for her and help grow her business, and she is convinced she will continue being very punctual and make her payments on time as she has done in the past. With the loan, she plans to purchase feed for her animals as well as build a corral to keep them more secure.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her animals and materials to fix her corral.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es:
Félix  de 60 años de edad, está casado con Basilia de 55 años, fruto de esta relación tienen una hija.
Ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Llochegua. Félix es un hombre lleno de experiencia por la vida. Él tiene un restauran y una jugueria donde labora juntamente con su querida esposa, con quien comparte sus momentos de tristeza y de alegría. Tiene más de 35 años dedicándose al expendio de todo tipo de comidas, cuenta con dos cocineros y ayudantes quienes le facilitan en la preparación de los mejores y exquisitas comidas.
Por ello está contento con su negocio por que gracias a la buena rentabilidad  que tiene ha logrado obtener todo los bienes inclusive a educar a su hija.
En un futuro próximo, desea abrir sucursales. Éste es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete una vez más en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los  1,000 nuevos soles realizará la compra de víveres para su restaurante.
texts.en: Félix is 60 years old and married to Basilia, 55, with whom he has a daughter. They live in their own home in the district of Llochegua. Félix is full of life experience. He has a restaurant and juice bar where we works alongside his beloved wife, with whom he shares both happy and sad moments. He has more than 35 years of experience selling all kinds of foods. He has two cooks and attendants who help him in preparing the best and most exquisite foods. He is content with his business because thanks to its profitability he has been able to get the good things in life, including educating his daughter. He hopes to open branches in the near future. This is his second loan with Kiva partner MFP, and he promises once again to make his payments on time. With the loan, he plans to purchase supplies for his restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients and products to prepare food.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es:
Juan, está solicitando nuevamente un préstamo, ya que necesita finalizar  el proceso del cultivo, en esta ocasión pagara la mano de obra para la recolección de la cosecha del maíz, ya que ha logrado terminar el proceso de la siembra.
Él considera que ha logrado mejorar su actividad agrícola, además ha avanzado en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Juan is again applying for a loan, as he needs to complete the cultivation process. At this time, he will pay for laborers to harvest his corn crop, as he has managed to complete the planting and cultivation process. 

He believes that he has succeeded in improving his farming, and has also made progress in his studies.

loans.use: To pay for laborers needed to harvest his corn crop.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es:
Teresa, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, con la intención de dinamizar el negocio, además que tiene una necesidad de cubrir gastos hospitalarios de su esposo, ya que lo van a operar de la vista,  este préstamo será para comprarse maíz y leña, y la otra parte para apoyar a su esposo.
El préstamo anterior le hizo obtener mejores ganancias, ya que adquirió maíz a bajo precio, en su familia lo único relevante que ha ocurrido en este periodo es la operación que le recetaron a su esposo.
texts.en:
Teresa is applying for a new loan, with the aim of energizing her business. In addition, she needs to cover her husband's hospital expenses, as he is going to have an eye operation. This loan will be to buy corn and firewood, and the remainder to support her husband.

The previous loan enabled her to get better earnings, as she acquired corn at a lower price. 

The only significant thing that has occurred in her family during this period is the operation that has been prescribed for her husband.

loans.use: To buy corn and firewood, and pay for medical expenses.

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
This is Michael, 35, a resident of Tanza, Cavite, Philippines. He is a single parent with one child. Michael manages his own household while operating the business. At this time, he is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Michael maintains a tricycle business. He owns and drives one tricycle (a motorcycle with a sidecar) that carries up to four passengers to their destination within the community. He starts working early in the morning and works until late in the evening. There are times when he drives until the wee hours in order to get a bigger profit. His regular customers are his neighbors and the local community. He earns a minimum of PHP 300 every day.

To help him continue operating his business, he is requesting a loan of PHP 14,000. He will be using the loan to buy motorcycle parts for the maintenance of his tricycle unit. He has to maintain his unit in good condition in order to have a regular income for the daily needs of his family. 

Michael hopes to buy another tricycle unit and hopes to support his child's schooling up to the college level. He faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work every week and so he can draw strength and inspiration from the word of God, which he studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the spare parts and maintenance of his tricycle

loans.name: Teofila

texts.en: Teofila is 27 years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is married with two children. Teofila used her last loan to obtain more ready to wear clothing to sell. Her business has grown and become successful. Now, she's taking a new loan for her sewing business, to buy sewing materials such as textiles, threads, etc. Positively, she hopes to be able to grow her business more.

loans.use: to buy sewing materials such as textiles, threads, etc.

loans.name: Mwanasiti

texts.en: Mwanasiti is a 26-year-old single woman. She has four children and all are enrolled in school. Mwanasiti operates a dry fish selling business and sells her goods at the market. She's worked in this business for two years. Her primary customers are the local area residents. She describes her greatest business challenge to be transportation, and her highest monthly expenses are food for her family and school fees for her children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Mwanasiti will use the Kes 30,000 loan to purchase more stocks of dry fish for resale. Mwanasiti aspires to establish a retail shop in the future. She joined Yehu because it offers quality financial services.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of dried fish for resale.

loans.name: Freddy

texts.es: Freddy de 34 años de edad convive con Yovana  de 30 años,  fruto de esta relación tienen 2 hijos, ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Llochegua. Cuando a uno le satisface y le encanta lo que esta haciendo es bueno dedicarse a ello, y eso es lo que Freddy realiza. Él nos comenta, que anteriormente se dedicaba como chofer pues lo hacia por una necesidad económica. Sin embargo no se sentía satisfecho, es por ello que lo dejó para dedicarse a cultivar cacao y café, pues ya tiene como 7 años dedicándose a esta labor de los cuales a obtenido buenas ganancias gracias a su esfuerzo incansable y dedicación continua. Generalmente trabaja con el apoyo de su querida esposa, pero en temporadas de cosecha y de mantenimiento siempre requiere de peones quienes le facilitan  su mano de obra para agilizar el trabajo. Freddy está contento con esta labor que tiene pues gracias a ello a comprado una casa. Este es su segundo préstamo con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar  puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles contratará peones para que lo ayudene a fertilizar y limpiar su campo agrícola.
texts.en: Freddy is 34 years old and lives with Yovana, age 30.  They have 2 children together.  They own their home which is located in the Llochegua district.  When you are doing something that satisfies you and that you like, it is good to pursue it as a career, and that is what Freddy is doing.  He tells us that he used to be a driver out of economic necessity.  However, he didn't feel very satisfied, so he left that job to cultivate cacao and coffee.  He has been doing this work for 7 years and earns good money thanks to his tireless efforts and continuous dedication.  He usually works with the support of his dear wife, but during the harvest and maintenance periods he needs laborers who help speed up the work.  Freddy is happy with this job as it has allowed him to buy a home.  This is his second loan with MFP.  He promises to make his payments on time.  With the 3000 new soles he will contract laborers to help him fertilize and clean up his fields.

loans.use: to hire laborers.

loans.name: Eng

texts.en:
Mrs. Eng, age 38, is in the business of cultivating rice in Kompong Cham province. She has been engaged in this business since 2005. She is able to generate income of $5.00 per day through this business. She has a common law relationship with her husband who is a rice cultivator as well as a carpenter. Presently she has three single children, who are still studying in public schools in the province. Eng said that she’ll provide her three children a further education, and at a minimum, a bachelor’s degree.

Eng would like to borrow some funds from HKL for her husband to buy wood, which can be used to produce tables, stools, and other furniture. She hopes that her family-owned business will improve through using the loan from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy wood, which can be used to produce tables, stools, and other furniture.

loans.name: Ernesto El Cuije Group

texts.es:
Este grupo lleva por nombre Ernesto el cuije los integrantes decidieron ponerle este nombre, por que así se llama el representante del grupo y su comunidad, la historia es acerca de la señora Fidela puesto que es la una de los integrantes de este grupo, cuenta con 46 años de edad y es viuda, tiene 4 hijos de los cuales solo Javier estudia cursa el primer año de secundaria, ya que los demás están casados, ella se dedica a la siembra y venta de maíz desde hace mas de 15 años.

Ella comenta que escogió este negocio porque dice que tiene terrenos y quiso aprovecharlos, aparte de que considera que es una muy buena fuente de ingresos, para mejorar su nivel de vida, el crédito que recibió lo  invirtió en la compra de maíz, fertilizantes, abono y peones para cosechar el maíz.
 
El sueño que tiene la señora Fidela es el de poder hacer crecer mucho mas su negocio, también quiere ahorrar para asegurar la educación de su hijo y pueda seguir estudiando y tenga una muy buena carrera profesional.

Dice que los integrantes de su grupo son gente de mucha confianza, responsable y  sobre todo muy trabajadoras, ya que tienen tiempo de conocerse y se conocen muy bien es por eso que nadie ha fallado con sus pagos.

Da las gracias a los prestatarios por poner sus ojos en personas que luchan día a día ya que son personas muy emprendedoras y aseguran que responderán a la confianza que la empresa le esta brindando.

Las integrantes que forman parte de este grupo tan emprendedor y las actividades que realizan son las siguientes: miguel-cultivo de maíz, sabino-cultivo de maíz, Anacleto-cultivo de maíz y Fidela-venta de maíz.
texts.en:
This group is called Ernesto el Cuije.  It is named for the group representative and their community.  

Fidela is one of the members of this group.  She is 46 years old and widowed.  She has 4 children, one of whom, Javier, is in the first year of secondary school.  The other children are all married.  Fidela has grown and sold corn for over 15 years. 

She chose this business because she had land and wanted to put it to use.  Moreover, it is a good source of income that can improve her living situation.  The loan was used to purchase corn and fertilizer and to hire laborers to harvest the corn.  

Fidela's dream is to be able to grow her business much more.  She also wants to save money to pay for her son's education, to ensure that he can continue studying and have a good professional career. 

She says that the members of her group are very trustworthy, responsible, and above all, hard workers.  They have all known each other for a long time and know each other well.  For this reason nobody has missed their payments.
 
She is thankful to the lenders for paying attention to people who fight day after day, as they are very hard working people and they will live up to the trust that has been placed in them.

The members of this hardworking group and their businesses are the following:  Miguel - growing corn, Sabino - growing corn, Anacleto - growing corn, and Fidela - selling corn.

loans.use: to purchase corn and fertilizer and to hire laborers to harvest the corn.

loans.name: Margarito Esteban

texts.es: Margarito Esteban tiene 37 años de edad, es una persona pensionada que mensualmente recibe una pensión atreves del seguro social y una ayuda alimenticia por parte de la empresa donde elabora por el accidente laboral donde él trabajaba. Margarito tiene un hijo que está recién nacido y que está a su cargo su esposa lo apoya incondicionalmente en todo para la mejoría de su familia. Margarito está solicitando financiamiento para la remodelación de las paredes de su casa lo cual con el crédito comprara cemento, hierro, arena entre otros materiales de construcción.
texts.en: Margarito Esteban is 37 years old.  He is a pensioner who receives a monthly pension from social security and food assistance from the company where he used to work due to an accident on the job.  Margarito has a newborn son whom he supports.  His wife supports him unconditionally in everything for the betterment of the family.  Margarito is requesting a loan to remodel the walls of his home.  With the loan he will purchase cement, iron, sand, and other construction materials.

loans.use: to purchase cement, iron, sand, and other construction materials.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en:
Beatrice is a 41-year-old married woman. She has 2 children, aged 3 and 12, both of whom are enrolled in school. Her husband Alex works as a businessman. Beatrice's highest monthly expenses are for food and school fees. She owns a house that has both electricity and piped water.

Beatrice operates a tailoring business located at the market. Her primary customers are local residents and students. She has worked in this business for 7 years. Her other source of income is farming. She describes her greatest business challenge as seasonality.  

Beatrice will use the loan of 40,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to purchase cloth fabrics and a new sewing machine for her business. She aspires to expand her business in the future and joined Yehu to access funds for expansion.

loans.use: To purchase cloth fabrics and a new sewing machine for her business.

loans.name: Jacinta Marcela

texts.es:
Jacinta, habitante de la ciudad de Lean, 30 años de edad, de oficio comerciante, la cual se dedica a la compra y venta de cerdos, negocio que su esposo le sugirió que pusiera para ganar sus propios ingresos y que le ha ayudado tanto a ella como mujer independiente y a la vez para cooperar con los gastos de  su casa. Este ha sido su primer negocio pues antes era ama de casa y solo se dedicaba a cuidar a sus tres hijos pero ahora ella combina estas actividades con la de  su negocio. Tiene sus clientes fijos, ella vende desde su casa la cal ha ido adecuando poco a poco 
Para tener en buenas condiciones a estos animales que requieren un cuido especial. Ella realizo el crédito para compra de cerdos para vender. Ella ha notado el crecimiento que esta actividad a tenido y es por tal motivo que necesita vender mas y especializarse en la crianza. Una de sus metas es comprar una camioneta para vender cerdos en las  afueras de león.
texts.en:
Jacinta, who lives in the city of León, is 30 years old.  She is a businesswoman who buys and sells pigs. Her husband suggested that she enter this business so that she could make her own money, and it has helped her become an independent woman and at the same time contribute to household expenses. 

This is her first business as she was a housewife previously and only cared for her three children.  Now she combines these activities with her business.  She has regular customers and sells from her home, which she has fixed up bit by bit.

To be in good shape, these animals require special care.  Jacinta took out a loan to purchase pigs for sale.  She has seen how much growth there has been in this area, and she therefore needs to sell more and specialize in raising the pigs.  One of her goals is to buy a truck to sell pigs in the outskirts of León.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Flor De Nardo Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama flor de nardo y se integra de tres señoras quien cada una se integra de tres señoras quien cada una se dedica  su respectiva actividad.
Quien se le tomo  la entrevista se llama  Candelaria quien es casada con el  señor  Roberto  y con  quien procreo tres hijos que a un están a su responsabilidad.
 
                   Ella solicito el préstamo pera invertirlo en la compra de  zapatos por catalogo  de la marca Andrea en donde lleva trabajando  un años dos meses en donde comenta que el va bien ya que con ello  ha mejorado mucho  sus ingresos en su  familia.
 

                Inicio por si sola ya que también quiere apoyar  a su esposo   con los  ingresos  de la casad y darle lo  más necesario  a su hijos que están creciendo.
Lo que desea de su  actividad es que con ello  pueda seguir adelante  y así mejorar cada día su compra de sus zapatos.

              Las personas que integran el grupo son las señora Ernestina invertirá el préstamo  en la compra de ingrediente para la elaboración de panes y  la señora vitalina  invertirá en la compra de comercios agrícolas.
texts.en:
The group is called Flor de Nardo and is made up of 3 women, each of whom has her own business.                      

Candelaria did this interview.  She is married to Roberto and they have 3 children who live with them.  Candelaria is requesting this loan to purchase Andrea brand shoes from a catalog.  She has had this business for a year and 2 months and tells us that it is going well. She has greatly increased her family's income. 

She started this on her own initiative because she wanted to help her husband with household expenses and provide for her growing children. She hopes that with this business she can get ahead and in this way improve her shoe sales every day.

The people in this group are Ernestina, who will use the loan to purchase ingredients to make bread, and Vitalina, who will purchase agricultural products.

loans.use: to purchase Andrea brand shoes from a catalog.

loans.name: Dioscora

texts.en:
Dioscora is 38 years old and is married with 6 children. Her husband works as a fisherman. Dioscora supports her husband's work by selling his catch at the market. She also buys more fish from other fishermen in her town. According to Dioscora, fishing has been her family's source of income for 13 years. Dioscora works hard to help provide for her family and send her children to school.

Dioscora has requested this loan to purchase fishing nets and floaters, which will help her and her husband catch more fish to sell. Dioscora hopes to earn more income, sustain her children's education, and improve their living situation.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets and floaters

loans.name: Ludiah

texts.en:
Ludiah is 35 years old and supports a family of eight. She is a widow, has been in business for 8 years, and has no additional income. She has three children who are all working. Her shop generates a monthly income of 5,000 Kenyan shillings (KES), and she plans to use her profits to expand the business by increasing her stock of goods.

Ludiah is borrowing for the second time from KADET LTD, having successfully completed her first loan. Her dream is to expand her business by increasing her stock of goods and thus increasing her profits.

loans.use: To buy assorted stock such as sweets, maize flour, margarine, and cooking flour

loans.name: Kwekwe

texts.en:
Kwekwe is a 27-year-old married woman. She has 4 children, 3 of whom are enrolled in school. Her husband Chombo works as a plumber. Kwekwe's highest monthly expenses are for food and school fees. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

Kwekwe operates a café and has worked in this business for 1 year. Her primary customers are local residents and students. Her other source of income is farming. She describes her greatest business challenge as seasonality.

Kwekwe will use the loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to purchase stocks of rice, beans, wheat flour, maize flour, and cooking oil for her business. She aspires to expand her business in the future and joined Yehu to access funds for expansion.

loans.use: To purchase stocks of rice, beans, wheat flour, maize flour, and cooking oil for her business.

loans.name: Malika

texts.ru: Малика замужем и любящая мать пятерых детей. Более 12 лет она занимается купле- продажей сухофруктов. Она торгует свой товар на местном рынке. В бизнесе помогают двух дочерей. Малика очень хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль. Малика хотела бы получить займ в размере 12000 сомони для покупки новых ассортиментов сухофруктов. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Malika is married and is a loving mother of five children. She has been reselling dry fruits for more than twelve years. She sells her merchandise on the local market. Her daughters help her in this business. Malika very much wants to expand her business to receive a good profit. She wants to get a loan in the amount of 12,000 somoni to buy a new assortment of dry fruits. She is hoping for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy a new assortment of dry fruits.

loans.name: Rahim

texts.ru: Рахим проживает в городе Худжанд. Возраст, 28 лет. Женат. Имеет одного ребенка. Рахим занимается торговлей верхней мужской одежды. Также он продает костюмы и брюки. Этим видом деятельности занимается три года. Кредит берет для покупки весенней одежды.
texts.en: Rahim lives in Khujand. He's twenty-eight years old, married and has one child. Rahim sells men's outerwear, suits and pants. He's been in this business for three years. Rahim is asking for a loan in order to buy some spring clothes.

loans.use: to purchase spring clothes.

loans.name: Orif

texts.ru: Ориф трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Он женат и имеет одного очаровательного ребенка. Жена занимается домохозяйством и присматривает за ребенком. Его родители живут с ними. Более 2-х лет Ориф занимается купле- продажей параболических антенн, а также ремонтирует и устанавливает их. Ориф запрашивает займ в размере 2000$ США для покупки параболических антенн.
texts.en:
Orif is a hardworking and honest person. He's married and has one beautiful child. His wife takes care of their household and watches after the kid. Orif's parents live with them. For over two years Orif has had a business dealing in parabolic antennas. He buys, sells, repairs and installs them. 
Orif is asking for a loan of 2000 dollars in order to buy some parabolic antennas.

loans.use: To purchase parabolic antennas

loans.name: Brenda Jeacqueline

texts.es:
Brenda, quiere comprar material para hacer mochilas, por eso está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, que le ayude a cubrir la compra de estos materiales, además comprara ropa como blusas, faldas, pantalones, para continuar en el negocio.
Ella considera que ha tenido una buena experiencia con el uso del préstamo anterior, ya que le dio la oportunidad de mejorar el negocio.
texts.en:
Brenda wants to buy material to make backpacks. This is why she is requesting a new loan, which will help her cover the cost of buying these materials. She will also buy clothing such as blouses, skirts and trousers, to continue her business.

She believes that she has had a good experience with using the previous loan, as it gave her the opportunity to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as blouses, skirts, trousers and material to make backpacks.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is a businessman. He runs a grocery store and sells onions, beans and peas to earn a living. He has been in this business for three years and describes his environment as good because he has many regular customers. 

Since Robert joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to grow his business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy onions, beans and peas.

loans.use: To buy onions, beans and peas

loans.name: Edith

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 36-year-old Edith from Waterloo. She is married and has two children, one of whom is 2 years old and one of whom is 12 years old. One of her children attends school. 

Edith runs a pharmacy. She sells cool syrup, nova gin, paracetamol tabs, and blood syrup and malaria drugs. She has been running this business for 14 years. She works from 8:00 am, 7 days a week. Her business is her main source of income. Edith says that the main challenges to her business are transportation and price inflation.

Edith has requested a loan in order to buy more blood syrup, malaria drugs, cool syrup and paracetamol tablets. The extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her profits. In the future, she plans to build a clinic. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: To purchase more blood tonic, malaria drugs, cough syrup and paracetamol tablets.

loans.name: Claudia Lucia

texts.es:
Claudia, de 37 años de edad es dueña de una pulpería, es comerciante desde hace 15 años, es casado, madre de dos hijos. Ella empezó a los 20 años de edad, su mama era comerciante vendía productos comestibles  ella se crio en ese ambiente del comercio  con tiempo ella se hizo cargo de su propia pulpería que  hoy en dia tiene y la cual la ha permitido sobrevivir, aportar en el hogar, vestir a sus hijos y desarrollarse como comerciante.
Ella realizo el crédito para compra de artículos escolares como cuadernos, lápices, borradores, libros, marcadores, libretas, calcetines, camisetas, uniformes.  Pues son productos que durante esta época le solicitan sus clientes por cantidad y no quiere perder la oportunidad de vender.Ella tiene planes de seguir ampliando su pulperia y vender productos nuevos.
texts.en:
Claudia is 37 years old is the owner of a general store. She has been a business woman for 15 years. She is married and mother to two children. She started when she was 20 years old. Her mother was a business woman who sold food products. She was raised in this business environment and in time she became the owner of her own general store, which she now runs. This has allowed her to survive, contribute in the home, dress her children and grow as a business woman.

She used the loan to buy school items such as notebooks, pencils, erasers, books, markers, booklets, socks, shirts, uniforms. These are products which during this season her customers want a lot of and she does not want to miss this opportunity to sell. She has plans to continue extending her general store and sell new products.

loans.use: to buy schools items such as notebooks, pencils, erasers, books, markers, booklets, socks, shirts, uniforms.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is a 26 year old man. He is married to Mary and they have one child, who is two years old. 

Daniel operates a kiosk in Kakamega dealing with household goods. He has been in this business for the last six years. Daniel earns a monthly income of KES 6,250. 

He is taking his first loan from KADET LTD, which he plans to use for adding stock like sugar and maize flour. He will use the profits to expand the business and invest in other businesses for the betterment of his family in future.

His dream is to own a big shop.

loans.use: To buy stocks of sugar, milk and maize flour.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy operates a posho mill business in Kangemi town. She is a 37-year-old single lady.

She was introduced to KADET LTD by a KADET client. This will be her first loan. She intends to use the loan to purchase maize for grinding into maize flour for sale.

In the future, Mercy hopes to expand her business into a major income earning for the family.

loans.use: to purchase maize for grinding into maize flour for sale.

loans.name: Kalondu

texts.en:
Kalondu is 36 years old and married with two children. 

She sells used clothes to earn a living. She has been in this business for nine years and employs one person. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to expand her business and hopes to be financially stable in the future. 

She has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy women blouses and skirts to sell.

loans.use: To buy women blouses and skirts to sell
